likelihood.description:
If there is a match (200 status), likelihood is a score (0-10)
                that predicts how similar the person data in the response is to the person data requested.
                If the request does not return a 200, likelihood is null.

data.description:
If response is 200, a person object is returned
                (referenced in schema/person.json file). If response code is not 200, data is null
